properties.areaDesc: Kohala; Big Island North and East
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 7 at 3:40PM HST until January 8 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu HI
properties.description:
...WIND ADVISORY FOR PARTS OF OAHU LANAI KAHOOLAWE MAUI AND
BIG ISLAND UNTIL 6 PM WEDNESDAY...

.A strong high pressure system will keep very windy trade winds
over the islands through at least Wednesday. The strongest winds
will be over and downwind of the mountains over portions of Oahu,
Lanai, Kahoolawe, Maui and the Big Island.

* WHAT...Northeast winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts to 50 mph.

* WHERE...Over and downslope of the Kohala mountains.

* WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Winds this strong can tear off shingles, knock down
tree branches and make it difficult to steer high profile
vehicles.
properties.instruction:
Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Be
prepared for power outages.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED
